title: Anyone else miss the flexibility of the old runes / masteries?

replies.body:
I'm going to miss having all speed quints. 

The ability to dodge everything and return to lane quickly will be sorely missed.
Just go sorcery/insp. Celerity plus magical footwear plus phase rush is a lot of speed

Wait what flexability? out of the Hundreds of runes outside of like Nasus you only needed 2 pages of runes and you have every single rune that would be needed. Outside of meme's such a Bankplank you only really needed AS/AD/MR/Armor/AP/Magic pen,armor pen. Those are the only runes you really needed for a majority of champions. How is that flexibility?
This is my exact point, the fact you could use the old runes with so many different champions, their ability to be used with so many different champions is what I was referring to as flexible.
Im going to miss how in jungle i could be really offensive in my masteries taking Thunderlords and Expose weakness, while still getting +16 starting armor for jungling.
At the end of the day you gotta realize that this is a strategy game and not a Team Death Match.
